CustomField.description: Created as part of partner Alignment project. This field used to hide the Review Deal Registration button.
CustomField.formula:
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'New'), OR( CASESAFEID($User.Id) == CASESAFEID(Partner_Account__r.OwnerId), CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) == '00e1P000000xVGuQAM', CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) == '00e1a000000UoNcAAK', CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) == '00e1P000000FBBDQA4' ) ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PAM Reviewed'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'AE Accepted'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'AE Ignored') ), OR( CASESAFEID($User.Id) == CASESAFEID(OwnerId), CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) == '00e1a000000UoNcAAK', CASESAFEID($Profile.Id) == '00e1P000000FBBDQA4' ) )
)
CustomField.label: Show Review Deal Registration
